@gign919191 wrote:

didnt work though :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 06:23:23 PM[/size][hr]dang it im trying to fix it for about 5 hours now… still cant!

please someone help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 09:51:12 AM[/size][hr]What if i change:

					if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {

To:

					if (newItemID <= 0 && newItemID >= 0) {

item.title: Need help with pickup and item permissions!
item.dc:creator: @darkbeam_x darkbeam x
item.description:
@darkbeam_x wrote:

right see where it says player rights? well it says =1 which means mod, just change it 2 for admin and 3 for owner. ON some servers it might be tht 1 is player 2 is mod 3 is admin i dont know just test it out

item.title: Need help with pickup and item permissions!
item.dc:creator: @gign919191 gign919191
item.description:
@gign919191 wrote:

hey! I am having some trouble… my pickup isnt working!

Heres the Pickup at client.java:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }
Oh, and also i need help with item permissions, like i want for example: whip for mod+ how can i do it?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with pickup and item permissions!
